title: JavaScript Event Introduction
description: Welcome to the JavaScript documentation! This lab will give you an introduction to events.

meta.title: JavaScript Events | Web Development Tutorial
meta.description: Discover the power of JavaScript events and how to create interactive web experiences. Learn to handle user interactions and enhance your web applications.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, events, web development, interactivity, user interactions, web applications

verify.name: Verify the running status of the web service
verify.hint: Please click on 'Go Live' in the bottom right corner to run the web service on port 8080. Then, you can refresh the **Web 8080** Tab to preview the web page.

i18n.title: JavaScript 事件介绍
i18n.description: 欢迎来到 JavaScript 文档！本实验将向你介绍事件。

meta.title: JavaScript 事件 | 网页开发教程
meta.description: 探索 JavaScript 事件的强大功能以及如何创建交互式网页体验。学习处理用户交互并增强你的网页应用程序。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 事件, 网页开发, 交互性, 用户交互, 网页应用程序

verify.name: 验证网络服务的运行状态
verify.hint: 请点击右下角的“上线”以在端口 8080 上运行网络服务。然后，你可以刷新 **Web 8080** 标签页以预览网页。
